title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.58 - Permission required to fuel, defuel, lubricate, clean or repair vehicles within terminal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.58 - Permission required to fuel, defuel, lubricate, clean or repair vehicles within terminal

State Regulations

No person shall fuel, defuel, lubricate, clean or
repair a vehicle or any part thereof, at the terminal, without
permission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1220.58

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
